text: Georg Ernst Stahl (22 October 1659 - 24 May 1734) was a German chemist, physician, and philosopher. He supported vitalism. His works on the phlogiston theory were used to explain chemical processes until the late-18th century.Ku- ming Chang (2008)"Stahl, Georg Ernst", Complete Dictionary of Scientific Biography, Vol. 24, from Cengage Learning ==References== Category:1659 births Category:1734 deaths Category:German chemists Category:German philosophers Category:People from Bavaria
title: Georg Ernst Stahl
